Interface Quiz

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuizImpl

    public interface Quiz
    An interface to represent a quiz containing a number of questions this quiz will be stored within a linked list and so also contains getNext and setNext methods

    A Quiz has a unique ID, a name and a set of questions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the id of the Quiz.

      Returns the name of the Quiz.
